name: Ojamaparty
desc:
If a LIGHT Machine Fusion Monster(s) and/or "Armed Dragon" monster(s) you control would be destroyed by battle or card effect, except "Hardened Armed Dragon", you can banish 1 "Ojama" card or "Ojamuscle" from your hand, field, or GY instead. You can only use each of the following effects of "Ojamaparty" once per turn.
● During the Main Phase: You can add 1 "Ojama" card or "Ojamuscle" from your Deck to your hand, then discard 1 card.
● If this card is sent to the GY: You can Special Summon as many of your banished "Ojama" monsters as possible.
